page.title: 12DEWSBURY ROSE MAJORETTES
page.content: Dewsbury Rose Majorettes have their {practices}at Thornhill, in the car park of Thornhill Edge Working Men's Club. The Majorettes started in 1983. We have six{drums,}four{glockenspiels, eight{batons,}four{flags,}8{pompoms.} There are about ten tiny tots who are learning to{march.} A{rival}group are Thornhill Lees Majorettes. When we go to the club on Monday and Thursday, we have to be there for 6.30 p.m. On Saturdays and Sundays we go to{galas}and {competitions,}if we{win}we get {medals.} I have got three medals, and I have been in the group for one year and I have medals for the torchlight parade and another two for the Dewsbury Sports Centre competition.
